meanings.sent1: The puzzle was left with partial pieces, making it impossible to complete.
meanings.sent2: She had a partial view of the stage from her seat in the back.
meanings.sent3: The partial cake on the table tempted me to take a bite before the party started.
meanings.sent4: His partial understanding of the subject led to confusion during the test.
meanings.sent5: The partial moon shone dimly in the night sky, casting a soft glow.

meanings.sent1: He only ate a partial of the cake, saving the rest for later.
meanings.sent2: The bookshelves were filled with partials of his comic book collection.
meanings.sent3: She grabbed a partial of the jigsaw puzzle to work on during her break.
meanings.sent4: The partial of the company's profits was enough to cover the expenses.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared a delicious dish using a partial of the ingredients.
